document_data.name: Ishkhanak
document_data.mainbody: '''Fenkenkabradon Ishkhanak''' was a [[dragonborn]] of [[Tymanther]] and the patriarch of [[Clan Fenkenkabradon]] in [[1487 DR]].
document_data.Description: Ishkhanak had dull silver scales and many scars on his body, the most prominent a bright line that bisected the left side of his snout.
document_data.Relationships: Ishkhanak was the elder brother of [[Fenkenkabradon Dokaan]].
document_data.History:
Ishkhanak expended most of his youth hunting dragons in the [[Smoking Mountains]].

In [[1487 DR]], Ishkhanak allied with [[Verthisathurgiesh Anala]] and [[Yrjixtilex Vardhira]] to put [[Yrjixtilex Kallan]] as the interim [[Vanquisher]], in preparation for the [[First Tymanther-Unther War]] and to outmaneuver his rivals, [[Clan Kepeshkmolik]].
